verse:
न तस्य कार्यं करणं च विद्यते न तत्समश्चाभ्यधिकश्च दृश्यते।
परास्य शक्तिर्विविधैव श्रूयते स्वाभाविकी ज्ञानबलक्रिया च

terms.बलक्रिया च: and strength or capacity for action

meaning: Meaning:The Supreme Being does not have any action or means of action, and is not seen or observed as greater than or superior to anything. However, the power of the Supreme Being is known to be diverse and inherent, as well as the knowledge and capacity for action.
